content: I'm not sure if we'll write our own vows or use traditional ones. We haven't really discussed it yet, but I think it'll be a great way to make the ceremony even more personal. As for the proposal, I think what really touched my heart was that Alex had my grandmother's engagement ring redesigned for me. It was such a thoughtful gesture, and it meant a lot to me that he wanted to incorporate my family's history into the proposal.
